title: Test Notion MCP Tool
summary: Test the Notion MCP tool to verify it's working correctly and explore its capabilities for interacting with Notion workspaces.

success_criteria.text: Successfully connect to Notion via MCP tool
Verify tool functionality and error handling

acceptance_checks.text: MCP tool responds to basic commands
Can perform at least one successful operation

subtasks: Test Notion authentication and workspace access

changelog.text: Tested MCP tool connectivity and Notion operations. All operations require valid API token.
Retested with additional operations (page creation). Consistent 401 unauthorized errors across all endpoints.
User added Notion API token to MCP configuration. Tool temporarily unavailable during reconfiguration.

decisions: Testing MCP tool functionality to understand capabilities and limitations
lessons_learned: Notion MCP tool requires valid API token for all operations
Tool responds correctly to authentication errors
All Notion operations (search, fetch, create) are blocked without proper credentials
issues_risks: MCP tool may have authentication requirements
Some operations may be limited by permissions
